summary: Bus conductor Tomiko falls in love with driver Niitaka, even though she also suspects him of being a serial killer who killed his female conductors after tiring of them.
cast: Rena Komine|Tadanobu Asano|Kotomi Kyôno|Tomoka Kurotani|Kirina Mano|Reiko Matsuo|Kyûsaku Shimada|Takeshi Ikeda|Chikako Hon'ami|Wui-Sin Chong
title: El laberinto de los sueños
